visual.name: NovaGrid
visual.description: Configurable matrix visual with conditional formatting and animations.

fontFamily.description: Default font family for all text

fontSize.description: Global font size for all text in the matrix

alignment.description: Alignment of data values in cells

blankRowSettings.description: Settings for blank rows between Level 0 items

enableBlankRows.description: Insert blank rows between Level 0 items

height.description: Height of blank rows in pixels

show.description: Show grand total row at the bottom

label.description: Label for the grand total row

color.description: Font color for grand total row

backgroundColor.description: Background color for grand total row
